des: The Stream plays Shiva Panchakshari 'Aum Namah Shivaya' in Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba's Voice. The Skill content is Sanskrit. Play the skill and engage in Meditation, House Hold Chores, and so on. An wholesome Spiritual Engagement offered to You by Sri Sathya Sai Media Centre, Prasanthi Nilayam.
